channel.title: Women In Music with Laney Goodman Show Preview
channel.description: Women In Music is a one-hour weekly public radio show, heard on over 100 markets nationwide, and online through our streaming affiliates.

item.title: Show Preview for the Week of April 27, 2010
item.description: On this coming week's show we'll hear all new music with Canadian singer/songwriters Catherine MacLellan, Amelia Curran and The Wailin' Jenny's... roots/rock with the latest from The Bittersweets out of Nashville, TN, and our featured artist for this week, Austin-based singer/songwriter Carrie Rodriguez... indie acoustic pop with new music from Sarah Hallman from Ottawa, Ontario, and the latest from New England singer/songwriter Erin McKeown... then we'll finish up the hour with electronica from a French trio called Telepopmusik with Angela McCluskey, and Boston's own Casey Desmond. That's all coming up on the next Women In Music.
